page.title: 05CUSTOMS
page.content: My name is{Sharon}Browne,I live on a {farm}with my{mother}and{father}and three{sisters. I have some{hens}and one{rooster,}we also have a few{cats,kittens}and two{dogs. When my{granda}was able to shoe a horse,he became a blacksmith.He only worked part time,so he only shod about four or five{horses}a day. {Farmers}who brought the{horses}helped him keep them steady if they were giving trouble.He had two{horses}of his own so he was able to shoe his own horses.People had to pay 10 shillings which is now 50p to get their horse shod.He shod the horses in a shed in the backyard,which is now used for sick cows and calves. Granda is now working on our farm and he says he'd far rather work on a farm than be a blacksmith.
